title: Cannot reproduce BERT MRPC accuracy on mxnet1.6.0rc1&2
body:
Cannot the [reported accuracy](https://github.com/dmlc/gluon-nlp/commit/5fe8d7b7f5770d82e4f3bfb489a67999d9442ce6#diff-4aa9944e2504738fdac28fee1d391628R124) with the master branch of GluonNLP and a pre-release build of MXNet.

## Build MXNet:
```
git checkout 1.6.0.rc2 #(or rc1)
    make \
        DEV=0                                     \
        ENABLE_TESTCOVERAGE=0                     \
        USE_BLAS=openblas                         \
        USE_MKLDNN=0                              \
        USE_CUDA=1                                \
        USE_CUDA_PATH=/usr/local/cuda             \
        USE_CUDNN=1                               \
        USE_CPP_PACKAGE=0                         \
        USE_DIST_KVSTORE=1                        \
        USE_SIGNAL_HANDLER=1                      \
        -j$(nproc)
```

## finetune log
```
root@04056391b12a:/workspace/gluon-nlp/scripts/bert# python3 finetune_classifier.py --batch_size 32 --lr 2e-5 --epochs 5 --gpu 0 --seed 27 --task_name MRPC --warmup_ratio 0.1
```
